Request for inspection / exceptional inspection of a ship or marine unit

This service allows inspection of the ship or marine unit to verify its compliance with national and international maritime standards and regulations, and to ensure its safety and operational efficiency before issuing or renewing safety certificates, operating licenses, or ownership registration.
Enter the insurance document number and select the issuing company and country. This information is required to prove insurance coverage.
Attach insurance document (if insurance company is outside the Sultanate)
Only files of 5MB or less.\nMust be png, jpeg, jpg, or pdf.
